subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn finished second to Maria Riesch of Germany in the final downhill of the season, failing to clinch the World Cup overall title but maintaining a lead with three races to go.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn finished second to Maria Riesch of Germany in the final downhill of the season, failing to clinch the World Cup overall title but maintaining a lead with three races to go.
